column5: Every Easter weekend, my kids and I have gone to small tribs for suckers or trout with varying success. This afternoon the son joined me to continue our Easter hunt. Armed with some canned corn, we went off to hunt for suckers so we could have some fresh catfish bait. Try as we would we could not find any. All we found were these little freight trains.    A great little afternoon excursion.
Some pretty colorful easter eggs Bruce!!! Gotta love the familly time that comes from these hollidays.
i hate it when those pesky buggers get in the way of catching suckers....better luck next time...
Colourful little suckers Bruce   Bet those are going to be tasty in the frying pan
